DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test experimental method , text-messaging app call B-RESILIENT , improve participant ' mood . B-RESILIENT text message app adaptation Resiliency Course , develop community member know Building Resiliency Community Hope .
DOC.detailed_description: In phase 1 , investigator hold series in-person virtual workshop Partnered Research Center Quality Care ( PRC ) community partner co-develop mobile intervention address community priority . The goal workshops develop novel mobile intervention base stakeholder input . The specific intervention develop determine base stakeholder input regard community priority workshops . Workshops audio and/or video record document process . One tool use process Chorus Participatory Mobile Framework create Center Health Services Society UCLA . Chorus web application allow user easily create mobile ( text messaging interactive voice ) application real-time without require server programming . The investigator use framework workshop develop test application real-time . Participants also give phone number call text intervention co-developed purpose testing , provide feedback , guide future development . In phase 2 , investigator conduct pilot randomize control trial B-RESILIENT tool develop workgroup phase 1 . Investigators enroll 30 adult South Los Angeles participate randomize , wait-list trial . The study group receive intervention 4 week , follow wait-list group another 4 week . Investigators conduct baseline follow-up survey , well in-person telephone workgroups , assess tool 's usability feasibility support management mood depressive symptom .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Speak English 3 . Endorse one item PHQ2 4 . Are able contact phone email , cell phone receive text message 5 . Have internet access 1 . Under age 18 year 2 . Endorse item PHQ2 screener 3 . PHQ8 score 15 great baseline interview 4 . No cell phone internet access 5 . Currently homeless 6 . Has prior diagnosis schizophrenia , psychosis , bipolar disorder 7 . Current alcohol substance abuse
